Footer.intro.p1.message: Rainbond is Cloud Native Application Management Platform.

Footer.intro.p2.message: Easy to use, No more dependence Yaml files, it is easy to deploy your application in Kubernetes

first.title.message: Cloud Native Multi Cloud Application Management Platform

first.description.message: Rainbond core 100% open source, Use easy, Don't need to understand Containers and Kubernetes, Support the management of multiple Kubernetes, Provide whole lifecycle management for enterprise application.

second.sourceCode1.message: Support for six common development languages

third.chooseRainbond.useEasy3.message: Don't need to write Dockerfile and YAML

third.chooseRainbond.useEasy4.message: Application as the center of the design concept

third.chooseRainbond.appDelivery1.message: One click install and upgrade of enterprise app

third.chooseRainbond.appDelivery2.message: Private delivery and personalized delivery efficiency increased

third.chooseRainbond.cloudNative2.message: Traditional apps become cloud native apps in one step

fifth.integratedDev.description.message: Integrated development and testing environment, Automatic identification of development languages and automatic builds, OOTB.

fifth.appUnifiedManage.description.message: Unified management of enterprise applications and computing resources, Automated operation and maintenance, Manage enterprise apps just like mobile apps.

fifth.multiCloud.description.message: Interconnect and manage hybrid cloud and various Kubernetes clusters, Apply transparency for deployment and migration on multiple clouds.

fifth.offlineDelivery.description.message: Automated delivery of offline applications, It also supports personalized customization and application O&M.

fifth.assemble.description.message: Business units are modularized by applying models, And through the drag and drop way to achieve business assembly.

fifth.localization.description.message: Support a variety of localization platforms, conversion of x86 architecture applications to Arm architecture.

fifth.continuousDelivery.description.message: Enterprise application one-click delivery to customers, and continuous upgrade iterations are supported.

fifth.personalizedDelivery.description.message: Through functional modularity, solve the problem of 2B enterprise personalized delivery.

fifth.rainstore.description.message: Cloud native technology driven of enterprise app store, Implement the app store of full process management, and support various delivery processes for enterprise applications.
